PackageOracle.name: PKG_VNT_PROCESS_RRT_OCR_ORDER
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.PKG_VNT_PROCESS_RRT_OCR_ORDER
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : pkg_vnt_process_nrt_contact
|| Created By : Knoll
|| Created Date : 10-OCT-2014
|| Subject Area : Order
|| Description : The package pkg_vnt_process_rrt_ocr_order controls the processing of the
|| Vantage vnt_rrt_ocr_order table and applying those updates to SOLODB.
|| Change log:
||
|| Changed By Changed On Change Description
|| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 10-Nov-2014 Standardization Changes
******************************************************************************************************************/
IS
PROCEDURE process(p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2);
END pkg_vnt_process_rrt_ocr_order;

body.name: PKG_VNT_PROCESS_RRT_OCR_ORDER
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.PKG_VNT_PROCESS_RRT_OCR_ORDER
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| Program Name : pkg_vnt_process_rrt_ocr_order
|| Created By : Knoll
|| Created Date : 04-Aug-2014
|| Subject Area : Order
|| Description : This is for loading Order details from the staging table 'VNT_RRT_OCR_ORDER_COMP' which are
|| coming from the RRT side..
|| Change log:
||
|| Changed By Changed On Change Description
|| ------------------- ------------ ------------------------------------------------------------------------
|| Cognizant 10-OCT-2014 Standardization Changes
|| Cognizant 09-Jan-2015 Data model change, Changed bus_interact_type_cd
|| and request_type_cd.
|| Cognizant 12-Jan-2015 UAT Defect Fix: Added logic to populate
|| t_bus_interact_party_role table
|| Cognizant 03-Mar-2015 Added update for T_PROD_ORDER and T_SPECIAL_REQUEST and
|| hard coded 'REQ' to T_BUS_INTERACT_PARTY_ROLE.BUS_INTERACT_TYPE_CD
|| Cognizant 07-Apr-2015 Code changes to remove the descrepanies between NRT/RRT , Initial Load and Reconciliation.
|| Cognizant 10-Apr-2015 Trim included for character column in cursor query.
|| Karthik 29-Apr-2015 Modified the table structure of T_BUS_INTERACT to have a new column
|| BUS_INTERACT_USAGE_TYPE_CD
|| Cognizant 01-May-2015 Removed the table t_bus_inter_itm_vnt_ord_xref
*****************************************************************************************************************/
SUBTYPE t_unit_name IS VARCHAR2 (30);

SUBTYPE t_userid IS VARCHAR2 (100 BYTE);

-- CONSTANTS
c_pkg_name CONSTANT t_unit_name
:= 'PKG_VNT_PROCESS_RRT_OCR_ORDER';
c_special_request_cd CONSTANT VARCHAR2 (1) := 'M';
-- EXCEPTION CONSTANTS
c_bulk_errors EXCEPTION;
PRAGMA EXCEPTION_INIT (c_bulk_errors, -24381);

-- CURSORS
-- Staged RRT_OCR_ORDER_COMP for processing
CURSOR cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order
IS
SELECT
-- staging control
rocr.ROWID AS ID, rocr.record_load_cd,

-- surrogate keys
cust_xref.party_id AS customer_id,
addr_xref.address_id AS service_address_id,
ord_xref.bus_interact_id,

-- values
--DECODE (rocr.ord_class_rocr,c_special_request_cd, 'SPREQ','PRORD') order_type_cd, --> Commented for Vantage - Data Model Change by Cognizant
DECODE (rocr.ord_class_rocr,
c_special_request_cd, pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_splreq,
pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_prdord
) request_type_cd,
rocr.cust_acct_no_rocr AS cust_acct_num,
rocr.order_no_rocr AS order_no,
TRIM (rocr.ord_stat_rocr) AS ord_stat_rocr,

--bi.bus_interact_type_cd, --commented in 12/03/15 by Cognizant
pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req
AS bus_interact_type_cd,
--Added in 12/03/15 by Cognizant
CASE
WHEN rocr.sys_rocr = 8313
THEN 'BRS'
ELSE 'VNT'
END AS data_source_type_cd,
TRIM (rocr.compl_cde_rocr) AS completion_cd,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.compl_cde_rocr, 1, 3)) AS completion_cd1,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.compl_cde_rocr, 4, 3)) AS completion_cd2,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.compl_cde_rocr, 7, 3)) AS completion_cd3,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.compl_cde_rocr, 10, 3)) AS completion_cd4,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.compl_cde_rocr, 13, 3)) AS completion_cd5,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.compl_cde_rocr, 16, 3)) AS completion_cd6,
TRIM (rocr.ord_rsn_rocr) AS reason_cd,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.ord_rsn_rocr, 1, 2)) AS reason_cd1,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.ord_rsn_rocr, 3, 2)) AS reason_cd2,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.ord_rsn_rocr, 5, 2)) AS reason_cd3,
TRIM (SUBSTR (rocr.ord_rsn_rocr, 7, 2)) AS reason_cd4,
DECODE
(rocr.create_dte_rocr,
TO_DATE ('00010101', 'YYYYMMDD'), NULL,
TO_TIMESTAMP ( TO_CHAR (rocr.create_dte_rocr,
'YYYY.MM.DD'
)
|| '.'
|| rocr.create_tme_rocr,
'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24.MI.SS'
)
) order_create_ts,
DECODE
(rocr.compl_dte_rocr,
TO_DATE ('00010101', 'YYYYMMDD'), NULL,
TO_TIMESTAMP ( TO_CHAR (rocr.compl_dte_rocr,
'YYYY.MM.DD')
|| '.'
|| rocr.compl_tme_rocr,
'YYYY.MM.DD.HH24.MI.SS'
)
) order_completion_ts
FROM stg.vnt_rrt_ocr_order_comp rocr LEFT OUTER JOIN t_party_vantage_xref cust_xref
ON cust_xref.cust_acct_num = rocr.cust_acct_no_rocr
AND cust_xref.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_service_address_vantage_xref addr_xref
ON addr_xref.hs_key = rocr.hse_key_rocr
AND addr_xref.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
LEFT OUTER JOIN t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref ord_xref
ON ord_xref.ord_no = rocr.order_no_rocr
AND ord_xref.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
/*LEFT OUTER JOIN t_bus_interact bi
ON bi.bus_interact_id = ord_xref.bus_interact_id
AND bi.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active*/ --commented in 12/03/15 by Cognizant
WHERE rocr.record_load_cd IS NULL
ORDER BY rocr.pull_dte_rocr,
DECODE (rocr.pull_tme_slot_rocr,
1, pkg_utility.l_final_slot,
rocr.pull_tme_slot_rocr
),
--Decode implemented for fixing the Slot issue on 19-Dec-2014 by Cognizant
rocr.order_no_rocr;

TYPE t_cursor_data_tbl IS TABLE OF cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE
INDEX BY PLS_INTEGER;

-- Forward declarations
PROCEDURE update_staging (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
--p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE
);

PROCEDURE create_customer (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE
);

PROCEDURE update_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
);

PROCEDURE create_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE
);

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_completion (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_data_source_type_cd t_prod_order_completion.data_source_type_cd%TYPE,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
);

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_reason (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_data_source_type_cd t_prod_order_reason.data_source_type_cd%TYPE,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
);

PROCEDURE update_spec_req_completion (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_data_source_type_cd t_special_request_completion.data_source_type_cd%TYPE,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
);

PROCEDURE update_spec_req_reason (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_data_source_type_cd t_special_request_reason.data_source_type_cd%TYPE,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
);

FUNCTION customer_exists (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cust_acct_num IN t_party_vantage_xref.cust_acct_num%TYPE
)
RETURN NUMBER;

FUNCTION get_bus_interact (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
-- p_order_no IN t_bus_inter_itm_vnt_ord_xref.ord_no%TYPE,
p_order_no IN t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.ord_no%TYPE,
p_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_bus_interact%ROWTYPE
)
RETURN BOOLEAN;

PROCEDURE process (p_audit_user_i IN VARCHAR2)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure process
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for Order details coming via RRT mechanism. Will go for Update if the case
already
|| exists and otherewise Inserts.
****************************************************************************************************************
*/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'PROCESS';
l_process_name t_process_log.process_name%TYPE := c_pkg_name;
l_process_rec pkg_logging.t_process_rec;
l_cursor_data t_cursor_data_tbl;
l_svc_processed VARCHAR2 (1);
l_ord_processed VARCHAR2 (1);
l_bus_interact t_bus_interact%ROWTYPE;
l_process_record_cnt NUMBER := 0;
l_error_record_cnt NUMBER := 0;
BEGIN
l_process_rec.process_name := l_process_name;
pkg_logging.begin_process (l_process_rec,
'p_audit_user_i=' || p_audit_user_i
);
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);

IF (cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order;
END IF;

OPEN cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order;

LOOP
FETCH cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order
BULK COLLECT INTO l_cursor_data LIMIT pkg_utility.c_rt_batchsize;

IF (l_cursor_data.COUNT () > 0)
THEN
-- process the updates
FOR i IN 1 .. l_cursor_data.COUNT
LOOP
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
'Processing order_no='
|| l_cursor_data (i).order_no
);

IF (l_cursor_data (i).customer_id IS NULL)
THEN
-- create stub customer as needed to support the order
create_customer (l_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i,
l_cursor_data (i)
);
END IF;

-- if no errors
IF (l_cursor_data (i).record_load_cd IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_cursor_data (i).bus_interact_id IS NULL)
THEN
-- lookup the order in case it was created earlier in the run
IF (get_bus_interact (l_process_rec,
l_cursor_data (i).order_no,
l_bus_interact
)
)
THEN
-- update the order
l_cursor_data (i).bus_interact_id :=
l_bus_interact.bus_interact_id;
l_cursor_data (i).bus_interact_type_cd :=
l_bus_interact.bus_interact_type_cd;
update_order (l_process_rec,
l_cursor_data (i),
p_audit_user_i
);
ELSE
-- create the order
create_order (l_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i,
l_cursor_data (i)
);
END IF;
ELSE
-- update the order
update_order (l_process_rec,
l_cursor_data (i),
p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
END IF;

update_staging (l_process_rec, l_cursor_data (i));
COMMIT;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception
(l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', order_no= '
|| l_cursor_data (i).order_no
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| l_cursor_data (i).bus_interact_id
|| ' exception='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack
()
);
l_cursor_data (i).record_load_cd :=
pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
END;

--Capturing the Processed/error record count
SELECT DECODE (l_cursor_data (i).record_load_cd,
NULL, 1,
pkg_utility.c_stg_processed, 1,
0
)
+ l_process_record_cnt,
DECODE (l_cursor_data (i).record_load_cd,
pkg_utility.c_stg_error, 1,
0
)
+ l_error_record_cnt
INTO l_process_record_cnt,
l_error_record_cnt
FROM DUAL;
END LOOP;
END IF;

EXIT WHEN l_cursor_data.COUNT () < pkg_utility.c_rt_batchsize;
END LOOP;

CLOSE cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order;

--Making entry to the Process Child table against Total Processed Record Count
pkg_logging.process_log_detail_populate
(p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_bucket_i => pkg_utility.c_prcssed_rec_text,
p_audit_value_i => l_process_record_cnt,
p_process_id_i => l_process_rec.process_id,
p_in_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
--Making entry to the Process Child table against Total Error Record Count
pkg_logging.process_log_detail_populate
(p_process_rec_i => l_process_rec,
p_audit_bucket_i => pkg_utility.c_error_rec_text,
p_audit_value_i => l_error_record_cnt,
p_process_id_i => l_process_rec.process_id,
p_in_audit_user_i => p_audit_user_i
);
--commenting for scheduler
pkg_logging.log_debug (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name || ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, pkg_utility.c_process_success);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
pkg_logging.log_exception (l_process_rec,
l_proc_name
|| ', exception='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
pkg_logging.end_process (l_process_rec, pkg_utility.c_process_error);

IF (cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ISOPEN)
THEN
CLOSE cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order;
END IF;

RAISE;
END process;

PROCEDURE create_customer (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure create_customer
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is creating new customer details if not already exists.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'CREATE_CUSTOMER';
l_account_id NUMBER;
l_customer_id NUMBER;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', cust_acct_num='
|| p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num
);
-- create customer if doesn't exist
l_customer_id :=
customer_exists (p_process_rec_i, p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num);

IF (l_customer_id IS NULL)
THEN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', creating customer'
);
-- party
p_cursor_row_io.customer_id :=
da_party.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
source_system_party_id => p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num,
-- party_nm => NULL,
party_subtype_cd => NULL,
party_child_subtype_cd => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
-- customer
da_customer.ADD (p_process_rec_i,
external_customer_id => NULL,
customer_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
first_contact_dt => NULL,
first_fulfillment => NULL,
first_payment => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
-- party_vantage_xref
da_party_vantage_xref.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
cust_acct_num => p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num,
party_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
ELSE
p_cursor_row_io.customer_id := l_customer_id;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd := pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', cust_acct_num='
|| p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num
|| ',customer_id='
|| p_cursor_row_io.customer_id
|| ', exception='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END create_customer;

FUNCTION customer_exists (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cust_acct_num IN t_party_vantage_xref.cust_acct_num%TYPE
)
RETURN NUMBER
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Function customer_exists
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : Checking whethere the customer already exists.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'CUSTOMER_EXISTS';
l_party_id t_party_vantage_xref.party_id%TYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', cust_acct_num='
|| p_cust_acct_num
);

SELECT xref.party_id
INTO l_party_id
FROM t_party_vantage_xref xref
WHERE xref.cust_acct_num = p_cust_acct_num
AND xref.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
RETURN l_party_id;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
pkg_logging.log_debug
(p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', cust_acct_num='
|| p_cust_acct_num
|| ',
customer NOT found in t_party_vantage_xref'
);
RETURN NULL;
END customer_exists;

FUNCTION get_bus_interact (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
-- p_order_no IN t_bus_inter_itm_vnt_ord_xref.ord_no%TYPE,
p_order_no IN t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.ord_no%TYPE,
p_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY t_bus_interact%ROWTYPE
)
RETURN BOOLEAN
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Function get_bus_interact
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : Function to get the details from table 'T_BUS_INTERACT' for the given Order Number
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'GET_BUS_INTERACT';
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', p_order_no='
|| p_order_no
);

SELECT a.*
INTO p_row_io
FROM t_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref xref INNER JOIN t_bus_interact a
ON a.bus_interact_id = xref.bus_interact_id
INNER JOIN t_request b
ON b.request_interaction_id = a.bus_interact_id
WHERE xref.ord_no = p_order_no
-- AND a.bus_interact_type_cd IN ('PRORD', 'SPREQ') --> Commented for Vantage - Data Model Change by Cognizant
AND b.request_type_cd IN
(pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_prdord,
pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_splreq
)
AND b.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
|| ', p_order_no='
|| p_order_no
);
RETURN TRUE;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', p_order_no='
|| p_order_no
|| ',
bus_interact NOT found'
);
RETURN FALSE;
END get_bus_interact;

PROCEDURE update_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure update_order
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : Updates the 'T_PROD_ORDER_STATUS' with the given Order status Codes for the given Bus
Interact Id
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_ORDER';
l_data_source_type_cd t_prod_order_reason.data_source_type_cd%TYPE
:= p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id
);

-- IF (p_cursor_row_io.order_type_cd = 'PRORD') --> Commented for Vantage - Data Model Change by Cognizant
IF (p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd =
pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_prdord
)
THEN
UPDATE t_prod_order
SET actual_completion_dttm = p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
product_order_create_dttm = p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
reason_cd = p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
completion_cd = p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
service_address_id = p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE product_order_id = p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id;

UPDATE t_prod_order_status a
SET a.product_order_status_cd = p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_rocr,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id;

-- completion codes
update_prod_order_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1,
l_data_source_type_cd,
1,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2,
l_data_source_type_cd,
2,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3,
l_data_source_type_cd,
3,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4,
l_data_source_type_cd,
4,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5,
l_data_source_type_cd,
5,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6,
l_data_source_type_cd,
6,
p_audit_user_i
);
-- reason codes
update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1,
l_data_source_type_cd,
1,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2,
l_data_source_type_cd,
2,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3,
l_data_source_type_cd,
3,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_prod_order_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4,
l_data_source_type_cd,
4,
p_audit_user_i
);
ELSE
UPDATE t_special_request
SET actual_completion_dttm = p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
create_dttm = p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
reason_cd = p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
completion_cd = p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
service_address_id = p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE special_request_id = p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id;

UPDATE t_special_request_status a
SET a.special_request_status_cd = p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_rocr,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id;

-- completion codes
update_spec_req_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1,
l_data_source_type_cd,
1,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2,
l_data_source_type_cd,
2,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3,
l_data_source_type_cd,
3,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4,
l_data_source_type_cd,
4,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5,
l_data_source_type_cd,
5,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_completion (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6,
l_data_source_type_cd,
6,
p_audit_user_i
);
-- reason codes
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1,
l_data_source_type_cd,
1,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2,
l_data_source_type_cd,
2,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3,
l_data_source_type_cd,
3,
p_audit_user_i
);
update_spec_req_reason (p_process_rec_i,
p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id,
p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4,
l_data_source_type_cd,
4,
p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd := pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id
|| ', exception='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END update_order;

PROCEDURE create_order (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure create_order
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for loading Order details specifically into the target table
|| 'T_BUS_INTER_VANTAGE_ORD_XREF' via Bulk Load Mechanism. Creates customer records
|| according to differenct Completion Codes.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'CREATE_ORDER';
l_bus_interact_id t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', order_no='
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
);
-- bus_interact
l_bus_interact_id :=
da_bus_interact.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
source_system_id => p_cursor_row_io.order_no,
bus_interact_type_cd => pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req,
bus_interact_usage_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
-- bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref
da_bus_inter_vantage_ord_xref.ADD (p_process_rec_i,
ord_no => p_cursor_row_io.order_no,
bus_interact_id => l_bus_interact_id,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
-- Creating new customers
da_request.ADD (p_process_rec_i,
request_interaction_id => l_bus_interact_id,
request_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
da_bus_interact_party_role.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
bus_interact_id => l_bus_interact_id,
party_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
party_role_cd => 'CUST',
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
source_system_party_id => p_cursor_row_io.cust_acct_num,
--bus_interact_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_type_cd,
bus_interact_type_cd => pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req,
effective_dttm => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);

-- product_order
-- IF (p_cursor_row_io.order_type_cd = 'PRORD') --> Commented for Vantage - Data Model Change by Cognizant
IF (p_cursor_row_io.request_type_cd =
pkg_utility.c_request_type_cd_prdord
)
THEN
-- customer order
da_customer_order.ADD (p_process_rec_i,
customer_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
customer_id => p_cursor_row_io.customer_id,
customer_order_type_cd => NULL,
customer_order_action_cd => NULL,
assigned_priority_cd => NULL,
due_dt => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
da_prod_order.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
actual_completion_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
product_order_create_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
requested_completion_dt => NULL,
reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
dnis_cd => NULL,
cancel_cd => NULL,
service_address_id => p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
bill_stop_dt => NULL,
bill_start_dt => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
-- prod_order_status
da_prod_order_status.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_status_cd => p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_rocr,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);

-- prod_order_completion
IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 1,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 2,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 3,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 4,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 5,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 6,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

-- prod_order_reason
IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 1,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 2,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 3,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_bus_interact_id,
product_order_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 4,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
-- special request
da_special_request.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
actual_completion_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_completion_ts,
create_dttm => p_cursor_row_io.order_create_ts,
requested_completion_dt => NULL,
reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd,
completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd,
dnis_cd => NULL,
cancel_cd => NULL,
service_address_id => p_cursor_row_io.service_address_id,
bill_stop_dt => NULL,
bill_start_dt => NULL,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
-- special_request_status
da_special_request_status.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_status_cd => p_cursor_row_io.ord_stat_rocr,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);

-- special_request_completion
IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd1,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 1,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd2,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 2,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd3,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 3,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd4,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 4,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd5,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 5,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_completion_cd => p_cursor_row_io.completion_cd6,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 6,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

-- special_request_reason
IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd1,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 1,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd2,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 2,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd3,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 3,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;

IF (p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4 IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_bus_interact_id,
special_request_reason_cd => p_cursor_row_io.reason_cd4,
data_source_type_cd => p_cursor_row_io.data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => 4,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd := pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', order_no='
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
|| ', bus_interact_type_cd= '
|| pkg_utility.c_bus_interact_type_cd_req
|| ', exception='
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END create_order;

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_completion (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_data_source_type_cd t_prod_order_completion.data_source_type_cd%TYPE,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure update_prod_order_completion
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for changing Order details in the target table 'T_PROD_ORDER_COMPLETION'.
|| This will do soft DELETE, UPDATE and INSERT operations according to the scenario.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_PROD_ORDER_COMPLETION';
l_completion t_prod_order_completion%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_bus_interact_id_i
);

BEGIN
SELECT a.*
INTO l_completion
FROM t_prod_order_completion a
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF (p_code_i IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_completion.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.del
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_completion.product_order_id,
product_order_completion_cd => l_completion.product_order_completion_cd,
data_source_type_cd => p_data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => l_completion.code_sequence_num,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
UPDATE t_prod_order_completion a
SET a.product_order_completion_cd = p_code_i,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i,
a.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;
END IF;
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
IF (p_code_i IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => p_bus_interact_id_i,
product_order_completion_cd => p_code_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => p_sequence_i,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
END;
END update_prod_order_completion;

PROCEDURE update_prod_order_reason (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_data_source_type_cd t_prod_order_reason.data_source_type_cd%TYPE,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure update_prod_order_reason
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for changing Order details in the target table 'T_PROD_ORDER_REASON'.
|| This will do soft DELETE, UPDATE and INSERT operations according to the scenario.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_PROD_ORDER_REASON';
l_reason t_prod_order_reason%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_bus_interact_id_i
);

BEGIN
SELECT a.*
INTO l_reason
FROM t_prod_order_reason a
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF (p_code_i IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_reason.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.del
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => l_reason.product_order_id,
product_order_reason_cd => l_reason.product_order_reason_cd,
data_source_type_cd => p_data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => l_reason.code_sequence_num,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
UPDATE t_prod_order_reason a
SET a.product_order_reason_cd = p_code_i,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i,
a.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active
WHERE a.product_order_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
IF (p_code_i IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_prod_order_reason.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
product_order_id => p_bus_interact_id_i,
product_order_reason_cd => p_code_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => p_sequence_i,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
END;
END update_prod_order_reason;

PROCEDURE update_spec_req_completion (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_bus_interact_id_i IN t_bus_interact.bus_interact_id%TYPE,
p_code_i IN VARCHAR2,
p_data_source_type_cd t_special_request_completion.data_source_type_cd%TYPE,
p_sequence_i IN NUMBER,
p_audit_user_i IN t_userid
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure update_spec_req_completion
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for changing Order details in the target table 'T_SPECIAL_REQUEST_COMPLETION'.
|| This will do soft DELETE, UPDATE and INSERT operations according to the scenario.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_SPEC_REQ_COMPLETION';
l_completion t_special_request_completion%ROWTYPE;
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
|| ', bus_interact_id='
|| p_bus_interact_id_i
);

BEGIN
SELECT a.*
INTO l_completion
FROM t_special_request_completion a
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;

IF (p_code_i IS NULL)
THEN
IF (l_completion.record_stat = pkg_utility.c_record_active)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.del
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => l_completion.special_request_id,
special_request_completion_cd => l_completion.special_request_completion_cd,
data_source_type_cd => p_data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => l_completion.code_sequence_num,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
ELSE
UPDATE t_special_request_completion a
SET a.special_request_completion_cd = p_code_i,
a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP,
a.modified_by = p_audit_user_i
WHERE a.special_request_id = p_bus_interact_id_i
AND a.data_source_type_cd = p_data_source_type_cd
AND a.code_sequence_num = p_sequence_i;
END IF;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
EXCEPTION
WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND
THEN
IF (p_code_i IS NOT NULL)
THEN
da_special_request_completion.ADD
(p_process_rec_i,
special_request_id => p_bus_interact_id_i,
special_request_completion_cd => p_code_i,
data_source_type_cd => p_data_source_type_cd,
code_sequence_num => p_sequence_i,
audit_user => p_audit_user_i
);
END IF;
END;
END update_spec_req_completion;

-- PROCEDURE update_staging (
-- p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
-- p_cursor_data_i IN t_cursor_data_tbl
-- )
-- IS
-- /****************************************************************************************************************
-- || SubProgram Name : Procedure update_staging
-- || Estimated Run Time :
-- || Description : This is for Updating the Staging table 'VNT_RRT_OCR_ORDER_COMP' with
-- || 'Record_Load_cd' = 'P' for the successful reocrds.
-- ******************************************************************************************************************/
-- l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_STAGING';
-- BEGIN
-- pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
-- l_proc_name
-- || ', '
-- || pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
-- );
-- FORALL i IN 1 .. p_cursor_data_i.COUNT
-- UPDATE stg.vnt_rrt_ocr_order_comp s
-- SET s.record_load_cd =
-- NVL (p_cursor_data_i (i).record_load_cd,
-- pkg_utility.c_stg_processed
-- ),
-- s.record_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
-- WHERE ROWID = p_cursor_data_i (i).ID;
-- pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
-- l_proc_name || ', '
-- || pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
-- );
-- END update_staging;
PROCEDURE update_staging (
p_process_rec_i IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec,
p_cursor_row_io IN OUT NOCOPY cur_stg_rrt_ocr_order%ROWTYPE
)
IS
/****************************************************************************************************************
|| SubProgram Name : Procedure update_staging
|| Estimated Run Time :
|| Description : This is for Updating the Staging table 'VNT_RRT_OCR_ORDER_COMP' with
|| 'Record_Load_cd' = 'P' for the successful reocrds.
******************************************************************************************************************/
l_proc_name t_unit_name := 'UPDATE_STAGING';
BEGIN
pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_start_text
);

BEGIN
UPDATE stg.vnt_rrt_ocr_order_comp s
SET s.record_load_cd =
NVL (p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd,
pkg_utility.c_stg_processed
),
s.record_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE ROWID = p_cursor_row_io.ID;
EXCEPTION
WHEN OTHERS
THEN
ROLLBACK;
p_cursor_row_io.record_load_cd := pkg_utility.c_stg_error;
pkg_logging.log_exception (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name
|| ', ORDER_NO = '
|| p_cursor_row_io.order_no
|| ', BUS_INTERACT_ID = '
|| p_cursor_row_io.bus_interact_id
|| ', EXCEPTION = '
|| DBMS_UTILITY.format_error_stack ()
);
END;

pkg_logging.log_debug (p_process_rec_i,
l_proc_name || ', '
|| pkg_utility.c_proc_end_text
);
END update_staging;
END pkg_vnt_process_rrt_ocr_order;
